question: Paperless licensing process for petroleum service stations has been launched through Petroleum and Explosives Safety Organisation (PESO). PESO comes under the aegis of which ministry?
option1: Ministry of Petroleum and Natural Gas
option3: Ministry of Road Transport and Highways
explanation:
The Department for Promotion of Industry and Internal Trade (DPIIT) has launched Paperless licensing process for petroleum service stations through Petroleum and Explosives Safety Organisation (PESO), earlier this month. DPIIT recently announced that it has issued more than 300 licenses after the launch of paperless system. The authenticity of the license can also be verified on the portal of PESO.
The Petroleum and Explosives Safety Organisation (PESO) functions under the aegis of Department for Promotion of Industry and Internal Trade, Ministry of Commerce and Industry.
